name: growing vines water bottle holder
notes:
or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern.
https://www.windingroadcrochet.com/crochet-water-bottle-holder/

the pattern is written in english using us terms.

pattern level: easy
this pattern uses the chain, half double crochet, slip stitch.

materials needed:
worsted weight yarn (size 4)
5 mm crochet hook
yarn needle and scissors

this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download, not a finished product. please make sure to download adobe reader at www.adobe.com if you do not already have it on your computer.
